## Describe the bug

The fonts on `/test` and `/test/another` page(s) are incorrect.

### Links

- example.com/test
- example.com/test/another

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to `x`
2. Click on `y`
3. `z` is set with the font 'Comic sans'

### Expected behavior

`z` is set with the font 'San Francisco'
